channel.title: Two phys 1 dead guy
channel.description:
#### What happened? 2 phys both rez one person and both rez procs are used
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? One phys is supposed to fail #### Steps to reproduce: Get two phys and rez a dude on 1 night #### Comments: If this is a feature plz change it anyways
